an5.239:1.1: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.239:1.7: And they waste a gift given in faith.
an5.239:1.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.239:2.1: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.239:2.7: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
an5.239:2.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
